revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=Orbi Satellite |revision=RBS50 |asin=B01LZG4KPC;US; |newegg=N82E16833122915 |price=250 |est_release_date=11/01/2016 |fcc_date=08/23/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=new |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY316200341 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019 |cpu1_cspeed=710 MHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=32 MiB |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q256FVFG |ram1=512 MiB |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019 |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip2_model=IPQ4019 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=0 |addl_chips=2.4GHz WLAN Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY2623L;;2; ,,, 5GHz WLAN Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;2; ,,, 5GHz Backhaul Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;4; ,,, Bluetooth 4.1 SoC;Cambridge Silicon Radio (CSR);CSR8811;;1; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, Bluetooth LE, |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ORBI50 |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |expansion_sfp_num= }}
:• '''1733Mbps''' - 4-stream 802.11ac backhaul (433Mbps per stream), :• '''866Mbps''' - 2-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''400Mbps''' - QAM-256 2.4GHz channel = '''''3000 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Orbi High-Performance AC3000 Tri-Band WiFi Satellite}}
''802.11ac Two-Stream Wave2 WiFi plus Dedicated Quad-Stream Wireless Backhaul'' :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk50.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=rbs50}} Identical to the [[Netgear Orbi Router (RBR50)]] except all four ethernet ports are for LAN. *Netgear Orbi Kit (RBK50): Orbi Router (RBR50) + Orbi Satellite (RBS50) *Netgear Orbi Kit (RBK53): Orbi Router (RBR50) + 2x Orbi Satellite (RBS50) :Setup GUI available at http://orbilogin.com when connected via Wi-Fi. ===Product features=== *Dedicated four stream 802.11ac wireless backhaul *4 GB of flash is claimed by Netgear ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33028-netgear-orbi-reviewed ''NETGEAR Orbi'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://community.netgear.com/t5/Orbi/Orbi-Router-Firmware-RBR50/td-p/1130054 ''Orbi Router Firmware RBR50'' on '''NETGEAR Community'''] :Mentions that the stock firmware is a variant of OpenWRT ===See also=== *[[List of Four Stream Hardware]] *[[Netgear Orbi Router (RBR50)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Router'' • [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/orbi/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (Dakota) 2x 2T2R, QCA9984 (Cascade) 4T4R AC *[[Netgear Orbi Satellite (RBS50)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Satellite'' • ''Orbi Kit (RBK50)'' :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (Dakota) 2x 2T2R, QCA9984 (Cascade) 4T4R AC *[[Netgear Orbi Router (RBR40)]] - *[[Netgear Orbi Satellite (RBS40)]] - *[[Netgear Orbi Wall Plug Satellite (RBW30)]] - *Netgear Orbi WiFi System ([https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk50.aspx RBK50]) - AC3000 (RBR50 + RBS50) *Netgear Orbi WiFi System ([https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk40.aspx RBK40]) - AC2200 (RBR40 + RBS40) *Netgear Orbi WiFi System ([https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk30.aspx RBK30]) - AC2200 (RBR40 + RBW30) __NOTOC__
